trans-unit.source: Defines a design-time object that is used to build strongly-typed runtime grammars that conform to the [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0](http://www.w3.org/TR/speech-grammar/).
trans-unit.target: Define um objeto de tempo de design usado para criar gramáticas de tempo de execução fortemente tipadas em conformidade com a [SRGS (Especificação de Gramática de Reconhecimento de Fala) Versão 1.0](http://www.w3.org/TR/speech-grammar/).

trans-unit.source: You can you construct an empty <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> instance and build a grammar by adding instances of classes that represent SRGS elements, such as <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf>,<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsSemanticInterpretationTag>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken>.
trans-unit.target: Você pode construir um vazio <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> instância e crie uma gramática adicionando instâncias de classes que representam elementos SRGS, como <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf>,<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsSemanticInterpretationTag>, e <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken>.

trans-unit.source: You can also construct an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> instance from an existing SRGS-compliant XML grammar file, from an instance of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>, or from an instance of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode construir um <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> instância de um arquivo de Gramática SRGS compatível com XML existente, de uma instância do <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>, ou de uma instância de <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>.

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> object is created, it can be loaded into a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object or compiled by <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsGrammarCompiler>, enabling it to be read by a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object.
trans-unit.target: Após o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> objeto é criado, ele pode ser carregado em um <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> de objeto ou compiladas por <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsGrammarCompiler>, habilitá-la ser lido por um <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objeto.

trans-unit.source: See [Create Grammars Using SrgsGrammar](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e4d9f96e-2241-4c39-b9e0-ac9ef4e9a906) in the [System Speech Programming Guide for .NET Framework 4.0](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/610116c7-3817-40ff-857b-5d41e8511043) for more information and examples.
trans-unit.target: Consulte [criar gramáticas usando SrgsGrammar](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e4d9f96e-2241-4c39-b9e0-ac9ef4e9a906) no [guia de programação de fala de sistema para o .NET Framework 4.0](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/610116c7-3817-40ff-857b-5d41e8511043) para obter mais informações e exemplos.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: Using the constructors for the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> class, you can create an instance of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> from a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>, or <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object, from a string that contains the path to an XML-format grammar, or you can initiate a blank instance of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: Usando construtores para o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> classe, você pode criar uma instância de <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> de um <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>, ou <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> de objeto, de uma cadeia de caracteres que contém o caminho para uma gramática de formato XML, ou você pode iniciar uma instância em branco de <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates an empty <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> instance.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor cria vazio <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> instância.

trans-unit.source: To build a grammar within an empty <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> instance, add instances of classes that represent SRGS elements, such as <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem>.
trans-unit.target: Para criar uma gramática em vazio <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> da instância, adicionar instâncias de classes que representam elementos SRGS, como <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf>, e <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem>.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> object and then creates a public rule named `winnerRule`.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir cria um <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> de objeto e, em seguida, cria uma regra pública denominada `winnerRule`.

trans-unit.source: It then creates an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> that consists of the string "A nation that has won the world cup is:", and adds this item to the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule.Elements%2A> property of the rule.
trans-unit.target: Ele cria um <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> a cadeia de caracteres que consiste em "é de um país que ganhou o cup world:" e adiciona esse item para o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule.Elements%2A> a propriedade da regra.

trans-unit.source: The example then creates two more rules (`ruleEurope` and `ruleSAmerica`), each of which is an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf> object that contains three <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> objects.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo cria duas regras mais (`ruleEurope` e `ruleSAmerica`), cada um de que é um <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf> objeto que contém três <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> objetos.

trans-unit.source: After that, another <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf> object is created that contains <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef> objects that refer to `ruleEurope` and `ruleSAmerica`.
trans-unit.target: Depois disso, outro <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf> objeto é criado contendo <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef> objetos que fazem referência a `ruleEurope` e `ruleSAmerica`.

trans-unit.source: The new <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf> object is then added to the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule.Elements%2A> property of `winnerRule`.
trans-unit.target: O novo <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf> objeto é adicionado para o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule.Elements%2A> propriedade `winnerRule`.

trans-unit.source: After this, all three rules (`winnerRule`, `ruleEurope`, and `ruleSAmerica`) are added to the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Rules%2A> property of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: Depois disso, todas as três regras (`winnerRule`, `ruleEurope`, e `ruleSAmerica`) são adicionados para o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Rules%2A> propriedade <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>.

trans-unit.source: Finally, the three rules are compiled into a binary representation of the grammar.
trans-unit.target: Por fim, as três regras são compiladas em uma representação binária da gramática.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder" /> object used to create the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder" /> usado para criar a instância <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> class from a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> de um objeto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example builds a grammar in a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> instance using <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices> objects.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir cria uma gramática de um <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> instância usando <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Choices> objetos.

trans-unit.source: It then creates an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> from the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> object.
trans-unit.target: Ele cria um <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> do <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> objeto.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="builder" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="builder" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="root rule" /> in the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> object.
trans-unit.target: O <see langword="root rule" /> no objeto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> class and specifies an <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule" /> object to be the root rule of the grammar.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> e especifica um objeto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule" /> para ser a regra raiz da gramática.

trans-unit.source: This constructor adds the specified rule to the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection> of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> object and sets it as the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Root%2A> rule for the grammar.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor adiciona a regra especificada para o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection> do <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> de objeto e define-o como o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Root%2A> regra da gramática.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates two rules (`chooseCities` and `destCities`) for choosing origin and destination cities for a flight.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir cria duas regras (`chooseCities` e `destCities`) para escolher as cidades de origem e destino para um voo.

trans-unit.source: The example initializes the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> instance using the `chooseCities` rule as an argument.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo inicializa o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> instância usando o `chooseCities` regra como um argumento.

trans-unit.source: The example writes the contents of the rules collection and the name of the root rule to the console.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo grava o conteúdo da coleção de regras e o nome da regra raiz para o console.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="grammarRootRule" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="grammarRootRule" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The location of the SRGS XML file.
trans-unit.target: O local do arquivo XML SRGS.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> class specifying the location of the XML document that is used to fill in the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> especificando o local do documento XML usado para preencher a instância <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a new <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> from the file named "srgsDocumentFile.xml".
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir cria um novo <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> do arquivo chamado "srgsDocumentFile.xml".

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="path" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="path" /> is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="path" /> é uma cadeia de caracteres vazia.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> object that was created with the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> XML instance.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> criado com a instância XML <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> class from an instance of <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> that references an XML-format grammar file.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> usando uma instância de <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> que faz referência a um arquivo de gramática em formato XML.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a new instance of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> from an instance of <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> that references the file "srgsDocumentFile.xml".
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir cria uma nova instância da <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> de uma instância do <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> que faz referência ao arquivo "srgsDocumentFile.xml".

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="srgsGrammar" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="srgsGrammar" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the assembly reference information for the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Obtém as informações de referência do assembly para a instância <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.AssemblyReferences" /> property returns a string collection containing a list of the assembly references.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.AssemblyReferences" /> propriedade retorna uma coleção de cadeia de caracteres que contém uma lista de referências de assembly.

trans-unit.source: Gets the code-behind information for the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Obtém as informações code-behind para a instância <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.CodeBehind" /> property returns a string collection that contains a list of the code-behind documents.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.CodeBehind" /> propriedade retorna uma coleção de cadeia de caracteres que contém uma lista de documentos por trás do código.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the culture information for the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define as informações de cultura da instância <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> object that contains the current culture information for <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> objeto que contém as informações de cultura atual para <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Windows and the System.Speech API accept all valid language-country codes.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Windows e a API Speech aceitar todos os códigos de país de idioma válidos.

trans-unit.source: To perform speech recognition using the language specified in the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Culture%2A> property, a speech recognition engine that supports that language-country code must be installed.
trans-unit.target: Para executar o reconhecimento de fala usando o idioma especificado no <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Culture%2A> propriedade, um mecanismo de reconhecimento de fala que dá suporte a que o código do país de idioma deve ser instalado.

trans-unit.source: The speech recognition engines that shipped with Microsoft Windows 7 work with the following language-country codes.
trans-unit.target: Os mecanismos de reconhecimento de fala fornecido com o Microsoft Windows 7 trabalhar com os seguintes códigos de país de idioma.

trans-unit.source: en-GB.
trans-unit.target: en-GB.

trans-unit.source: English (United Kingdom)
trans-unit.target: Inglês (Reino Unido)

trans-unit.source: en-US.
trans-unit.target: en-US.

trans-unit.source: English (United States)
trans-unit.target: Inglês (Estados Unidos)

trans-unit.source: de-DE.
trans-unit.target: de-DE.

trans-unit.source: German (Germany)
trans-unit.target: Alemão (Alemanha)

trans-unit.source: es-ES.
trans-unit.target: es-ES.

trans-unit.source: Spanish (Spain)
trans-unit.target: Espanhol (Espanha)

trans-unit.source: fr-FR.
trans-unit.target: fr-FR.

trans-unit.source: French (France)
trans-unit.target: Francês (França)

trans-unit.source: ja-JP.
trans-unit.target: ja-JP.

trans-unit.source: Japanese (Japan)
trans-unit.target: Japonês (Japão)

trans-unit.source: zh-CN.
trans-unit.target: zh-CN.

trans-unit.source: Chinese (China)
trans-unit.target: Chinês (China)

trans-unit.source: zh-TW.
trans-unit.target: zh-TW.

trans-unit.source: Chinese (Taiwan)
trans-unit.target: Chinês (Taiwan)

trans-unit.source: Two-letter language codes such as "en", "fr", or "es" are also permitted.
trans-unit.target: Os códigos de idioma com duas letras, como "en", "fr" ou "es" também são permitidos.

trans-unit.source: The value being assigned to <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Culture" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor que está sendo atribuído ao <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Culture" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The value being assigned to <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Culture" /> is <see cref="P:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor que está sendo atribuído ao <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Culture" /> é <see cref="P:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.InvariantCulture" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether line numbers should be added to inline scripts.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define se os números de linha devem ser adicionados a scripts embutidos.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Debug" /> property returns <see langword="true" /> if line numbers should be added for debugging purposes; otherwise the property returns <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Debug" /> propriedade retorna <see langword="true" /> se os números de linha devem ser adicionados para depuração; caso contrário, a propriedade retornará <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the related namespaces for the current <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Obtém os namespaces relacionados à instância <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> atual.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.ImportNamespaces" /> property returns a string collection that contains a list of the related namespaces in the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.ImportNamespaces" /> propriedade retorna uma coleção de cadeia de caracteres que contém uma lista dos namespaces relacionados a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> instância.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the programming language used for inline code in the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a linguagem de programação usada para o código embutido na classe <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Language" /> property returns the programming language to which <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> is currently set.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Language" /> propriedade retorna a linguagem de programação para o qual <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> está definido atualmente.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the mode for the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o modo para a classe <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: The recognition mode of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: O modo de reconhecimento do <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Mode%2A> property returns a member of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsGrammarMode> that determines the type of input that the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> expects.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Mode%2A> propriedade retorna um membro do <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsGrammarMode> que determina o tipo de entrada que o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> espera.

trans-unit.source: The two possible values are `Voice` for speech input, and `Dtmf` for input of dual-tone multi-frequency (DTMF) tones that are commonly associated with a telephone.
trans-unit.target: Os dois valores possíveis são `Voice` para entrada de fala, e `Dtmf` para entrada de tons de multi-frequência de tom dual (DTMF) que são normalmente associadas com um telefone.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the namespace of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o namespace da classe <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Namespace" /> property returns the namespace for the current <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Namespace" /> propriedade retorna o namespace atual <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the phonetic alphabet of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o alfabeto fonético da classe <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns the phonetic alphabet that must be used to specify custom pronunciations in the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o alfabeto fonético que deve ser usado para especificar a pronúncia personalizada no <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken" /> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Phonetic alphabets are composed of phones, which consist of letters, numbers or characters, sometimes in combination.
trans-unit.target: Letras do alfabeto fonético são compostas de telefones, que consistem em letras, números e caracteres, às vezes, em combinação.

trans-unit.source: Each phone describes a unique sound of speech.
trans-unit.target: Cada telefone descreve um som exclusivo de fala.

trans-unit.source: This is in contrast to the Latin alphabet, for which any letter may represent multiple spoken sounds.
trans-unit.target: Isso está em contraste com o alfabeto latino, para que qualquer letra pode representar vários sons faladas.

trans-unit.source: Consider the different pronunciations of the letter "c" in the words "candy" and "cease", or the different pronunciations of the letter combination "th" in the words "thing" and "those".
trans-unit.target: Considere a pronúncia diferente da letra "c" na "Cessação" e "balas" palavras ou a pronúncia diferente da combinação da letra "th" na coisa"palavras" e "as".

trans-unit.source: In System.Speech, you can use any of three phonetic alphabets to specify custom pronunciations: International Phone Alphabet (IPA), Universal Phone Set (UPS), or the SAPI phone set.
trans-unit.target: Em Speech, você pode usar qualquer um dos três letras do alfabeto fonético para especificar pronúncia personalizada: alfabeto de telefone internacional (IPA), conjunto de telefone Universal (UPS) ou o SAPI phone conjunto.

trans-unit.source: The specified phonetic alphabet determines which phone set will be used to define inline pronunciations for <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken> objects.
trans-unit.target: Alfabeto fonético específico determina qual conjunto de telefone será usado para definir a pronúncia embutido para <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken> objetos.

trans-unit.source: The phones specified in <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken.Pronunciation%2A> must match the phonetic alphabet specified in <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.PhoneticAlphabet%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Os telefones especificados em <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken.Pronunciation%2A> deve coincidir com o alfabeto fonético especificado em <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.PhoneticAlphabet%2A>.

trans-unit.source: See [Lexicons and Phonetic Alphabets](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/435e3c6f-6834-4e5a-b0f6-c17b2275dc51) for more information.
trans-unit.target: Consulte [dicionários e letras do alfabeto fonético](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/435e3c6f-6834-4e5a-b0f6-c17b2275dc51) para obter mais informações.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the root rule of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a regra raiz da classe <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns the rule that is designated as the root rule of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna a regra que é designada como a regra raiz da <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> object must already be in the document's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection> before it can be set to the **root rule**.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> objeto já deve estar no documento de <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection> antes que ele pode ser definido como o **regra raiz**.

trans-unit.source: You can also set the root rule for an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> object by using an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> object as the argument to the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode definir a regra raiz para um <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> objeto usando um <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> objeto como o argumento para o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> construtor.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a rule named `winnerRule`, and then creates an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> object named `document`.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir cria uma regra denominada `winnerRule`e, em seguida, cria um <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> objeto chamado `document`.

trans-unit.source: The example then calls the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection.Add%2A> method to add the rule to the document.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo, em seguida, chama o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection.Add%2A> para adicionar a regra para o documento.

trans-unit.source: Finally, the example sets the document's <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Root%2A> property to `winnerRule`, thereby making it the `root rule` for the grammar defined by the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> object.
trans-unit.target: Por fim, o exemplo define o documento <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Root%2A> propriedade `winnerRule`e, portanto, tornando-o `root rule` para a gramática definida pelo <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of rules that are currently defined for the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de regras definidas no momento para a classe <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns the rules defined for the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Retorna as regras definidas para o <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> objeto.

trans-unit.source: You can add <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> objects to the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection> by using the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection.Add%2A> method on the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Rules%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Você pode adicionar <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> objetos para o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection> usando o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection.Add%2A> método o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Rules%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: If you initialize an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> object and specify an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> object as the argument, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> is automatically added to the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection> for the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: Se você inicializar um <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> de objeto e especificar um <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> objeto como argumento, o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule> é adicionado automaticamente ao <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection> para o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a grammar that recognizes the phrase "A nation that has won the World Cup is" followed by the name of a country that has won the World Cup.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir cria uma gramática que reconhece a frase "é de um país que ganhou o Cup World" seguido do nome de um país que ganhou o Cup do mundo.

trans-unit.source: The example creates an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> object, and then creates a public rule named `winnerRule`.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo cria um <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> objeto e, em seguida, cria uma regra pública denominada `winnerRule`.

trans-unit.source: After adding a string to the rule `winnerRule`, the example creates two more rules (`ruleEurope` and `ruleSAmerica`), each containing a list of countries.
trans-unit.target: Depois de adicionar uma cadeia de caracteres para a regra `winnerRule`, o exemplo cria duas regras mais (`ruleEurope` e `ruleSAmerica`), cada um contendo uma lista de países.

trans-unit.source: Using the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection.Add%2A> method, the example adds all three rules (`winnerRule`, `ruleEurope`, and `ruleSAmerica`) to the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Rules%2A> property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: Usando o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRulesCollection.Add%2A> método, o exemplo adiciona todas as três regras (`winnerRule`, `ruleEurope`, e `ruleSAmerica`) para o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Rules%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the .NET scripting language for the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a linguagem .NET para a classe <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="Script" /> property returns the current .NET scripting language for the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> class.
trans-unit.target: O <see langword="Script" /> propriedade retorna a linguagem de script .NET atual para o <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> classe.

trans-unit.source: This property has been deprecated.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade foi substituída.

trans-unit.source: Its use is no longer recommended.
trans-unit.target: Seu uso não é recomendado.

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to set the <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Script" /> property to null.
trans-unit.target: Foi feita uma tentativa de definir a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Script" /> para nulo.

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to set the <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Script" /> property to an empty string.
trans-unit.target: É feita uma tentativa de definir a propriedade <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Script" /> para uma cadeia de caracteres vazia.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> that is used to write the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlWriter" /> que é usado para gravar a instância <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: Writes the contents of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> object to an XML-format grammar file that conforms to the [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761).
trans-unit.target: Grava o conteúdo do objeto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> em um arquivo de gramática em formato XML que está de acordo com a [SRGS (Especificação de Gramática de Reconhecimento de Fala) Versão 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761).

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> object, and then creates a public rule named `winnerRule`.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir cria um <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> objeto e, em seguida, cria uma regra pública denominada `winnerRule`.

trans-unit.source: It then creates an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> that consists of the string "A nation that has won the world cup is:", and adds this item to the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule.Elements%2A> property of the rule.
trans-unit.target: Ele cria um <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> a cadeia de caracteres que consiste em "é de um país que ganhou o cup world:" e adiciona esse item para o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule.Elements%2A> a propriedade da regra.

trans-unit.source: The example then creates two more rules (`ruleEurope` and `ruleSAmerica`), each of which is an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf> object that contains three <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> objects.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo cria duas regras mais (`ruleEurope` e `ruleSAmerica`), cada um de que é um <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf> objeto que contém três <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> objetos.

trans-unit.source: After that, another <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf> object is created that contains <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef> objects that refer to `ruleEurope` and `ruleSAmerica`.
trans-unit.target: Depois disso, outro <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf> objeto é criado contendo <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRuleRef> objetos que fazem referência a `ruleEurope` e `ruleSAmerica`.

trans-unit.source: The new <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf> object is then added to the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule.Elements%2A> property of `winnerRule`.
trans-unit.target: O novo <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsOneOf> objeto é adicionado para o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule.Elements%2A> propriedade `winnerRule`.

trans-unit.source: After this, all three rules (`winnerRule`, `ruleEurope`, and `ruleSAmerica`) are added to the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Rules%2A> property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: Depois disso, todas as três regras (`winnerRule`, `ruleEurope`, e `ruleSAmerica`) são adicionados para o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Rules%2A> propriedade do <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>.

trans-unit.source: Finally, the example creates an empty XML file and an instance of <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>.
trans-unit.target: Finalmente, o exemplo cria um arquivo XML vazio e uma instância de <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.WriteSrgs%2A> method uses the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> instance to write the contents of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> to the XML file.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.WriteSrgs%2A> método usa o <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> instância para gravar o conteúdo do <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> para o arquivo XML.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="srgsGrammar" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="srgsGrammar" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the base URI of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o URI de base da classe <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: The current base URI of <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" />.
trans-unit.target: O URI de base atual da <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.XmlBase%2A> property gets a value that is used to resolve relative URIs in a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.XmlBase%2A> propriedade obtém um valor que é usado para resolver os URIs relativos em um <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Suppose the value for <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.XmlBase%2A> is "http://www.contoso.com/" and the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> contains a relative rule reference to another document, for example `SrgsRuleRef("ExternalGrammar.grxml")`.
trans-unit.target: Suponha que o valor de <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.XmlBase%2A> é "http://www.contoso.com/" e o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> contém uma referência de regra relativo a outro documento, por exemplo `SrgsRuleRef("ExternalGrammar.grxml")`.

trans-unit.source: This creates the following absolute path to the external document: `http://www.contoso.com/ExternalGrammar.grxml`.
trans-unit.target: Isso cria o seguinte caminho absoluto para o documento externo: `http://www.contoso.com/ExternalGrammar.grxml`.
